units.title: Transplantation of blood vessel organoids into kidney capsule
units.text: 1 Transplant blood vessel organoids into the kidney capsule of immunocompromised mice as previously described37. When transplanting, use one blood vessel organoid per kidney and transplant the entire blood vessel organoid (Fig. 4a). Transplanted blood vessel organoids can be grown in mice for >6 months.
units.rationale: Describes a specific, actionable step for in vivo transplantation of the organoids.
